ygData.subject: Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
ygData.msgSnippet: But what are the natural enemies of the Monks?  I ve killed Gnolls until I was blue in the face, Giant Spiders, Giant Beatles, and anything else I could find
ygData.messageBody:
But what are the natural enemies of the Monks? I've killed Gnolls until
I was blue in the face, Giant Spiders, Giant Beatles, and anything else
I could find in the Qeynos area to no avail.


>From: "Tom Wang" <twang@...>
>Reply-To: EverQuest@onelist.com
>To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
>Date: Fri, 2 Apr 1999 21:18:52 -0600
>
>From: "Tom Wang" <twang@...>
>
>Simply go and kill monsters/enemies that monks dislike, you'll
eventually
>regain your favor with the monks.
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Munk <Munk@...>
>To: <EverQuest@onelist.com>
>Sent: Friday, April 02, 1999 6:49 PM
>Subject: [EverQuest] Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
>
>
>> From: "Munk" <Munk@...>
>>
>> I have heard that there is a way to recieve head bands in addition to
>sashes
>> for monks. I was told you must go to queynos and get it there.
>> so if there are monks there, they may train you...
>>
>> Garan lvl 6 monk [E'Ci]
>> Nafertina lvl 4 necro [Tunare]
>>
>> >From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>
>> >
>> >Well, I'm a monk, 7th level, and I accidentally killed a Monk NPC
>> >(forgot to hit enter before talking, you've all been there
probably).
>> >Now all the monk guilds hate me, and will not train me. So two
>> >questions:
>> >
>> >How can I get back on the good side of my guild?
>> >and
>> >Where can I train in the meantime?
>> >Get Your Private, Free Email at http://www.hotmail.com
>> >
>>
